meta.content: BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure
UPDATE:April 22, 2020We are grateful to be able to offer free breakfast and lunch to all children...

ol.li: BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure

img.alt: BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure
img.div:
BAS Offers Meal Service During Closure
Baraga Schools
Tuesday, March 17, 2020
img.p: We are grateful to be able to offer free breakfast and lunch to all children under the age of 18 or any special needs adult under the age of 26. Please indicate below if you want the school to provide food for your child(ren). If you select "yes" below, you MUST pick up food on THURSDAY between the hours of 11:00 a.m.-1:00 p.m. Only a parent/guardian may pick up food for their child(ren). PLEASE SUBMIT THIS ORDER FORM BY NOON ON MONDAY, APRIL 27TH. Click on the link below. This form is for the month of May.

Baraga Area Schools Grab-N-Go Food Service is changing to better meet the needs of our staff and our community. Starting next week, food can be picked up on Thursdays from 11:00 a.m. -1:00 p.m. The deadline to fill out the online form is now Monday, April 6th at 12:00 p.m. This form allows you to request food for the next three weeks. Please follow the social distancing guidelines when picking up your child's food. If someone is at the door picking up food, wait in your vehicle until they are done.
UPDATE: March 23, 2020 There is a new form to fill out to recieve food for the week of April 6th-April 13th.

Baraga Area Schools will be offering free meal services during the COVID-19 closure in a grab-and-go style that will provide families with meals for the week. The school will offer free breakfast and lunch to all children under the age of 18 or any special needs adult under the age of 26, for the duration of the three-week school closure, starting March 20th. Please fill out the Google Form if you are interested in receiving this service. You must pick up food on Friday between the hours of 10:00 a.m.-1:00 p.m at the central office doors or make other arrangements with Jeanne Artley at 353-6690. Only a parent/guardian may pick up food for their child(ren) (not a friend or neighbor). PLEASE SUBMIT THIS ORDER FORM BY NOON ON THURSDAY. Thank you and stay healthy.

p.a: BAS FREE BREAKFAST AND LUNCH FORM

div.p:
